name: wtf8::Wtf8Buf::into_string_lossy

core::ops::IndexMut::index_mut.doc:
Performs the mutable indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.

core::str::<impl str>::as_bytes.doc:
Converts a string slice to a byte slice. To convert the byte slice back
 into a string slice, use the [`from_utf8`] function.

 # Examples

 ```
 let bytes = "bors".as_bytes();
 assert_eq!(b"bors", bytes);
 ```

doc:
Consumes the WTF-8 string and converts it lossily to UTF-8.

 This does not copy the data (but may overwrite parts of it in place).

 Surrogates are replaced with `"\u{FFFD}"` (the replacement character ‚ÄúÔøΩ‚Äù)
